kickstart.description: Put support files on a Rocks frontend that enables building EC2-compatible VMs
kickstart.post:
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add var service=ec2 component=kernel value=None /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add var service=ec2 component=kernelTar value=None /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add var service=ec2 component=kernelVersion value=None /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add var service=ec2 component=initrd value=None
/opt/ec2/bin/rocks-set-ec2-vars
